At 5th level, you can delve into the subconscious mind of a sleeping target. You can cast @Compendium[pf1.spells.xllxylvvqr82o2d5]{Detect Thoughts} as a spell-like ability on any adjacent sleeping creature. Additionally, you can gain the benefit of detect thoughts on a target of your @Compendium[pf1.spells.ifcnx1yyw6e7ousm]{Dream}, @Compendium[pf1.spells.sbjna6uk79pysjv6]{Minor Dream}, or @Compendium[pf1.spells.siv3ub7hbmcklf8c]{Nightmare} spells as if you had studied the target for 3 rounds. If you cast dream scan (see page 166), you know whether you received false information from the dream. A successful Will save negates mind heist.

You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to your Charisma modifier.
